shunit2_help.txt:
shunit2 help is online at
https://github.com/zandev/shunit2/blob/master/doc/shunit2.txt
http://shunit2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/source/2.1/doc/shunit2.html#function-reference

Summary
-------
test functions must start with test. 

assertEquals [message] expected actual
assertNotEquals [message] expected actual
assertSame [message] expected actual
assertNotSame [message] unexpected actual
assertNull [message] value
assertNotNull [message] value
assertTrue [message] condition
assertFalse [message] condition
fail [message]

oneTimeSetUp
    called once before any tests are run
setUp
    called once before each test is run
tearDown
    called once after each test is run
oneTimeTearDown
    called once after all tests are run
test_file-system.sh:
#!/bin/bash

test_pwd_to_print_current_working_dir()
{
  local expected="/sandboxes/puffin"
  assertEquals ${expected} $(pwd)
  assertEquals ${expected} ${PWD}  
}

test_cd_to_change_directory()
{
  cd /etc
  assertEquals "/etc" ${PWD}
  cd - > /dev/null
}

test_ls_to_list_contents_of_current_dir()
{
  local lsOutput=$(ls)
  local first=$(echo $lsOutput | awk '{print $1}')
  assertEquals "cyber-dojo.sh" $first
}

test_ls_dir_to_list_contents_of_given_dir()
{
  local lsOutput=$(ls /etc)
  local first=$(echo $lsOutput | awk '{print $1}')
  assertEquals "TZ" $first  
}

test_dot_means_the_current_dir()
{
  local lsOutput=$(ls .)
  local first=$(echo $lsOutput | awk '{print $1}')
  assertEquals "cyber-dojo.sh" $first  
}

test_dot_dot_means_the_parent_dir()
{
  local lsOutput=$(ls ..)
  local first=$(echo $lsOutput | awk '{print $1}')
  assertEquals "puffin" $first  
}

test_mkdir_makes_a_dir()
{
  assertFalse "[ -d mydir ]"
  mkdir mydir
  assertTrue  "[ -d mydir ]"
  rmdir mydir
}

test_mkdir_p_makes_a_dir_and_intermediate_dirs()
{
  assertFalse "[ -d my/dir/ect ]"
  mkdir my/dir/ect 2> /dev/null
  assertNotEquals 0 $?
  assertFalse "[ -d my/dir/ect ]"
  
  mkdir -p my/dir/ect
  assertEquals 0 $?
  assertTrue  "[ -d my/dir/ect ]"
  rmdir my/dir/ect
  rmdir my/dir
  rmdir my
  assertFalse "[ -d my ]"
}

test_rmdir_rf_recursive_force() 
{
  mkdir -p my/dir/ect
  rm -rf my
  assertEquals 0 $?
  assertFalse "[ -d my ]"
}

test_cp_to_copy_a_file()
{
  assertFalse "[ -e /tmp/shunit2_help.txt ]"
  cp shunit2_help.txt /tmp
  assertEquals 0 $?
  assertTrue "[ -e ./shunit2_help.txt ]"
  assertTrue "[ -e /tmp/shunit2_help.txt ]"
  rm /tmp/shunit2_help.txt
}

test_mv_to_move_a_file()
{
  assertFalse "[ -e /tmp/shunit2_help.txt ]"
  mv shunit2_help.txt /tmp
  assertEquals 0 $?
  assertFalse "[ -e ./shunit2_help.txt ]"
  assertTrue  "[ -e /tmp/shunit2_help.txt ]"
  rm /tmp/shunit2_help.txt
}

# load and run shUnit2
source shunit2
